title: At Last, This Is What You’ve Been Searching For!
posting_body: Nickel Creek Apartments, managed by Cushman & Wakefield
Come wiggle your toes in our picturesque pool, stroll through our pet-friendly community with your favorite furry companion, or have a day out on the town in nearby Edmonds.
We know you deserve the very best in apartment living, and our community is designed specifically to ensure you don't just lease, you live.
Go take a look at our photo gallery and schedule your appointment, or drop by and visit us for your personal tour today!

Nickel Creek provides its residents a wide selection of unique one or two-bedroom apartment homes with upgraded interiors that feature exclusive community and household amenities like a swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center, and spa.
Seize your chance to live in one of the premier apartment communities in Lynnwood, WA.
Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, newly renovated homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.

Located in Alderwood, Lynnwood, with easy access to 204 Street Southwest and Larch Way, Nickel Creek is just minutes away from Edmonds Community College, as well as all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby Edmonds has to offer.
This two bedroom one bathroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with washer/dryer, linen closet, fireplace and a patio!
